snippet: A federal judge threw out the Pennsylvania governor’s lawsuit against the N.C.A.A. over penalties against Penn State related to Jerry Sandusky.
abstract: Federal judge throws out antitrust lawsuit by Pennsylvania Gov Tom Corbett against the NCAA over penalties against Penn State related to Jerry Sandusky.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge threw out the Pennsylvania governor’s lawsuit against the N.C.A.A. over penalties against Penn State related to Jerry Sandusky.

headline.seo: Governor’s Lawsuit Over Penn State Penalties Is Dismissed
headline.main: Governor’s Lawsuit Against N.C.A.A. Over Penn State Penalties Dismissed
